description: Former journalist Ivan Safronov is suspected of passing secrets to a Nato country but denies any guilt.
title: Russian space official Safronov charged in treason probe
title_page: Russian space official Safronov charged in treason probe - BBC News
maintext: There will be an especially intense focus on this case, though. Ivan Safronov is well known in Moscow journalist circles. A young man who wrote on often sensitive, military topics, he's described by friends as honest, open and professional and there is a sense of bewilderment - and fear - here at his arrest.
